title: FormData
description: The `FormData` JS browser API object allows constructing a set of key-value pairs representing form fields and their values, which can be easily sent using `XMLHttpRequest` or `fetch()` to submit forms.
content: The browser API object used to construct and send key-value pairs, representing form fields and their values, via HTTP requests. It's typically used with `fetch()` or `XMLHttpRequest` to submit form data.
